# Test Template

This is a generic clarification generator template.

---

## Context Block

Next Document: Project Discovery Document

Purpose: Explore solution space, validate assumptions, identify risks.

Questions Asked Here Must:
- Affect how discovery is run
- Change what discovery needs to explore

---

## Output Schema

{"$schema":"https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema","type":"object","properties":{"questions":{"type":"array"}}}

## Rules

- Do not invent
- Stay factual
